title: Shade in the Side of the Boundary Line
text: $$(0,0)$$ is a solution to $$y<\frac{1}{2} x-\frac{3}{2}$$. Since $$(0,0)$$ is on the left side of the line, we shade the left side of the boundary line in red.\n##figure4.gif##
